titleStmt.title: England's lamentation, or Her sad estate lamented as also a call to the heads and rulers, and all sorts to repentance, and shewing them the cause why so many disasters, and the judgements of God which are in the earth, and also a way how to remove the same, with an answer to some objections. Through the servant of the Lord, S.H.
titleStmt.author: Hubbersty, Stephen, 1632?-1711.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
